Plot: A high-profile terrorism case unexpectedly binds together two ex-lovers on the defense team - testing the limits of their loyalties and placing their lives in jeopardy.
Title: Closed Circuit
Actors: Kate Lock, Katherine Press, Patrick Warner, Ricky Nixon
tomatoConsensus: Slick and well acted, Closed Circuit unfortunately never quite works up a full head of steam, with a plot that's alternately predictable and full of holes.
